name: PATHFINDER 08
description:
Pathfinder 08 is a fun and challenging adventure. It is a platform game with a focus on exploration and retro inspiration with some RPG elements. Your hero is a traveler looking for
treasures in dangerous places inhabited by monsters. He uses a sword that has several types of improvements and throughout his adventure he acquires skills that will enable
collect previously inaccessible resources. Destroy as many monsters as you can to supply your battery of energy and use your special abilities strategically, either to protect yourself
or attack.
Pathfinder 08 features:
- Exploration skills are acquired during the adventure.
- Active and passive attack skills.
- Puzzles.
- Enemies have different strategies to be overcome.
- Epic bosses where you need to use strategies to win.
- Pixel graphics.
- Gamepad support.
